String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Throw if request execution was interrupted.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Mask of the directory elements. It allows you to filter directory's elements by name. If parameter is not null, method's result will be contains information only about those elements which name is match to given template. Mask should be in the "glob" format.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Throw if on request execution the client error has occurred or if was communication error.

String.Value: Throw if on request execution the client error has occurred or if was communication error.

String.Value: Remote directory creation. This method allows the client to create a directory in the specified path, including any necessary but nonexistent top-level directories.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Full path to the root directory.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Calls system selector dialog. Method sends callback request on the client upon receipt of which the client must show the dialog to select the directory.

String.Value: ARTE instance.Can't be null.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Throw if waiting time was up.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: The time limit for waiting for a response in seconds. A value of 0 is interpreted as an infinite expectation.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Throw if on request execution the client error has occurred or if was communication error.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Removes (renames) folder on client. Method allows to change path to the specified file on the client. If method execution was successfully directory will be available by new path. Folder contents will be saved. Method execution will be finished with error if folder with newName is already exists. If dirName is the same as newName, method will be finished normally.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Current full path to the folder. Can't be null.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Full path to the directory which content you want to obtain. Can't be null.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: The time limit for waiting for a response in seconds. A value of 0 is interpreted as an infinite expectation.

String.Value: Throw if waiting time was up.

String.Value: Throw if waiting time was up.
